member.name: T:qtree.core.website.ApiResponse
member.summary: ResponseManager - Handle responses and transform them into response format

member.name: M:qtree.core.website.ApiResponse.Empty``1(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String)
member.summary: ResponseManager.Empty > no dataobject to wrap Deafault : message = "no data" error = "true" status = "NotFound" code = 404

member.name: M:qtree.core.website.ApiResponse.DataResponse``1(``0,System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String)
member.summary: ResponseManager.DataResponse > map a dataobject that is retrieved from services to the "data" object in the response Default: error = false status = HttpStatusCode.OK code = 200 data = Mapped(dataObject)

member.name: M:qtree.core.website.ApiResponse.Warning``1(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String)
member.summary: ResponseManager.Warning >> Response where the dataobject is not returned to the user Deafault: message = "Deze actie is niet toegstaan." error = "true" status = HttpStatusCode.MethodNotAllowed code = 405 data =

members.member:
ResponseManager.Error >> Response where the dataobject is not returned to the user
the exception or any other dataobject that needs to be in the data object for the client default InternalServerError when provided this will be the message when not provided and the dataobject is a string, the message will be the value of the dataobject when an exception is passed Response object where data object is absent (not initialized)

member.name: M:qtree.core.website.Controllers.MyFirstController.Get
member.returns: 200 | OK ; the data is returned in the data object
